description.english: Complete the stealth tutorial in Ranzaar with Jan.
description.french: Terminez le didacticiel de furtivité à Ranzaar avec Jan.
description.german: Das Anschleich-Tutorial in Ranzaar mit Jan abschließen.
description.italian: Completa il tutorial di furtività a Ranzaar insieme a Jan.
description.spanish: Completa el tutorial de sigilo en Ranzaar con Jan.
description.dutch: Voltooi de stealth tutorial in Ranzaar bij Jan.
description.brazilian: Complete o tutorial de furtividade em Ranzaar com Jan.

displayName.italian: Te la senti di lasciare Ranzaar?

description.english: Complete all four tests with Jan.
description.german: Alle vier Prüfungen mit Jan abschließen.
description.french: Réussissez les quatre épreuves avec Jan.
description.italian: Completa le quattro prove con Jan.
description.spanish: Completa las cuatro pruebas con Jan.
description.dutch: Voltooi de vier testen van Jan.
description.brazilian: Complete os quatro testes com Jan.

description.english: Find Shamaz Zeb and speak to him.
description.german: Shamaz Keb finden und mit ihm sprechen.
description.french: Trouvez le shamaz Zeb et parlez-lui.
description.italian: Trova Shamaz Zeb e parla con lui.
description.spanish: Encuentra a Shamaz Zeb y habla con él.
description.dutch: Vind Shamaz Rab en praat met hem.
description.brazilian: Encontre Shamaz Zeb e fale com ele.

description.english: Kill the gamors far to the east of the village.
description.german: Die Gamor weit im Osten des Dorfes töten.
description.french: Éliminez les gamors se trouvant loin à l'est du village.
description.italian: Uccidi i Gamor nella parte più orientale del villaggio.
description.spanish: Mata a los Gamores al este de la aldea.
description.dutch: Dood de gamors ver ten oosten van het dorp.
description.brazilian: Mate os gamors ao leste da aldeia.

description.english: Destroy the four boats in Shamazaar to weaken the soldiers!
description.german: Die vier Boote in Shamazaar zerstören, um die Soldaten zu schwächen!
description.french: Détruisez les quatre bateaux à Shamazaar pour affaiblir les soldats !
description.italian: Distruggi le quattro navi a Shamazaar per svegliare i soldati!
description.spanish: ¡Destruye los cuatro barcos en Shamazaar para debilitar a los soldados!
description.dutch: Verzwak de soldaten door de vier boten in Shamazaar te vernietigen!
description.brazilian: Destrua os barcos em Shamazaar para enfraquecer os soldados!

displayName.french: Ça ne ressemble pas à un gorgor !
displayName.italian: Non sembra il rumore di un Gorgor!
displayName.dutch: Dat klinkt niet als een Gorgor!

description.english: Kill the beast in the water behind the temple of Ka.
description.german: Die Bestie im Wasser hinter dem Ka-Tempel töten.
description.french: Éliminez la créature dans l'eau derrière le temple de Ka.
description.italian: Uccidi la bestia nell'acqua dietro al tempio di Ka.
description.spanish: Mata a la bestia del agua detrás del templo de Ka.
description.dutch: Dood het beest in het water achter de tempel van Ka.
description.brazilian: Mate o monstro na água atrás do templo de Ka.

description.english: A worker at one of the temples wants the Yods to clear away the debris.
description.german: Ein Arbeiter bei einem der Tempel möchte, dass die Yods die Trümmer beseitigen.
description.french: Un travailleur de l'un des temples veut que les Yods déblayent les décombres.
description.italian: Un operaio di uno dei templi vuole che gli Yod liberino l'area dai detriti.
description.spanish: Un trabajador de uno de los templos quiere que los Yods retiren los escombros.
description.dutch: Een werker in een van de tempels wil dat de Yods de brokstukken opruimen.
description.brazilian: Um dos trabalhadores dos templos quer que os Yods limpem os destroços.

description.english: Find a Shamaz and convince him to heal Ilott.
description.german: Einen Shamaz finden und ihn überzeugen, Ilott zu heilen.
description.french: Trouvez un shamaz et convainquez-le de soigner Ilott.
description.italian: Trova uno Shamaz e convincilo a curare Ilott.
description.spanish: Busca a un Shamaz y convéncelo para que cure a Ilott.
description.dutch: Vind een Shamaz en overtuig hem Ilott te genezen.
description.brazilian: Encontre um Shamaz e convença-o a curar Ilott.

description.english: Deliver a Twon-ha for Zolass.
description.french: Amenez un twon-ha à Zolass.
description.italian: Consegna il Twon-ha per conto di Zolass.
description.spanish: Entrega un Twon-ha para Zolass.
description.dutch: Lever een Twon-ha voor Zolass.
description.brazilian: Entregue um twon-ha para Zolass.

description.english: Use dynamite on a chest.
description.french: Utilisez de la dynamite sur un coffre.
description.italian: Usa la dinamite per aprire un forziere.
description.spanish: Usa dinamita con un cofre.
description.dutch: Gebruik dynamiet op een kist.
description.brazilian: Use dinamite em um baú.

description.english: Defeat at least 20 soldiers for Maar.
description.french: Tenez en échec au moins 20 soldats pour Maar.
description.italian: Sconfiggi almeno 20 soldati per Maar.
description.spanish: Derrota al menos a 20 soldados para Maar.
description.dutch: Versla tenminste 20 soldaten voor Maar.
description.brazilian: Derrote pelo menos 20 soldados para Maar.

displayName.english: So, that's a Mon, is it?
displayName.german: So sieht also ein Mon aus...
displayName.spanish: Así que eso es un Mon, ¿no?

description.english: Find the Mon in Shamazaar.
description.french: Trouvez le Môn à Shamazaar.
description.italian: Trova il Mon a Shamazaar.
description.spanish: Encuentra el Mon en Shamazaar.
description.dutch: Vind de Mon in Shamazaar.
description.brazilian: Encontre o Mon em Shamazaar.

description.english: Reach the region of Okasankaar.
description.french: Atteignez la région d'Okasankaar.
description.italian: Raggiungi la regione di Okasankaar.
description.spanish: Alcanza la región de Okasankaar.
description.dutch: Bereik de Okasankaar-regio.
description.brazilian: Chegue à região de Okasankaar.

description.english: Help Sadar fix his boat using a Zeedog plant.
description.german: Sadar mit einer Zlingtog-Pflanze bei der Bootsreparatur helfen.
description.french: Aidez Sadar à réparer son bateau à l'aide d'une plante
description.italian: Aiuta Sadar a riparare la sua nave usando una pianta di Zeedog.
description.spanish: Ayuda a Sadar a reparar su barco usando una planta Zeedog.
description.dutch: Help Sadar zijn boot terug te maken door een Zeedog plant te gebruiken.
description.brazilian: Ajude Sadar a consertar o barco dele com uma planta Zeedog.

displayName.french: Projecteur du bateau réparé à Okasankaar
displayName.italian: Luce di una nave riparata a Okasankaar
displayName.brazilian: Luz do barco consertada em Okasankaar

description.english: Help Zernar fix the boat light by providing a piece of helidium from Motazzar.
description.german: Zernar mit einem Stück Helidium aus Motazaar dabei helfen, das Bootslicht zu reparieren.
description.french: Aidez Zernar à réparer le projecteur du bateau avec un fragment d'helidium provenant de Motazzar.
description.italian: Aiuta Zernar a riparare la luce della nave dandogli un pezzo di helidium di Motazzar.
description.spanish: Ayuda a Zernar a reparar el faro proporcionándole un trozo grande de helidium de Motazaar.
description.dutch: Help Zernar het bootlicht terug te maken door een stuk helidium van Motazzar te voorzien.
description.brazilian: Ajude Zernar a consertar a luz do barco com um fragmento de helidium de Motazzar.

description.english: Destroy the company of soldiers located in Zorkatraz.
description.french: Anéantissez la compagnie de soldats situés à Zorkatraz.
description.italian: Distruggi il gruppo di soldati situati a Zorkatraz.
description.spanish: Destruye la compañía de soldados ubicados en Zorkatraz.
description.dutch: Vernietig de compagnie soldaten in Zorkatraz.
description.brazilian: Destrua a companhia militar localizados em Zorkatraz.

description.english: Unlock the wheel to enter the Darosham!
description.german: Das Rad lösen, um den Darosham-Tempel zu betreten!
description.french: Débloquez le levier circulaire pour accéder au Darosham !
description.italian: Sblocca la ruota per entrare nel Darosham!
description.spanish: ¡Desbloquea la rueda para entrar en el Darosham!
description.dutch: Ontgrendel het wiel om de Darosham binnen te gaan!
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie a roda para entrar em Darosham!

description.english: Obtain the Mon in Okasankaar.
description.french: Obtenez le Môn à Okasankaar.
description.italian: Ricevi il Mon a Okasankaar.
description.spanish: Consigue el Mon de Okasankaar.
description.dutch: Vind de Mon in Okasankaar.
description.brazilian: Obtenha o Mon em Okasankaar.

description.english: Reach the region of Motazaar.
description.french: Atteignez la région de Motazaar.
description.italian: Raggiungi la regione di Motazaar.
description.spanish: Alcanza la región de Motazaar.
description.dutch: Bereik de Motazaar-regio.
description.brazilian: Chegue à região de Motazaar.

displayName.german: Die Brücke über den Abgrund ist Geschichte!

description.english: Damage the rift bridge to slow the soldiers down.
description.german: Die Brücke über den Abgrund zerstören, um die Soldaten aufzuhalten.
description.french: Endommagez le pont du gouffre pour ralentir les soldats.
description.italian: Danneggia il ponte per rallentare i soldati.
description.spanish: Daña el puente de la falla para ralentizar a los soldados.
description.dutch: Vertraag de soldaten door de riftbrug te beschadigen.
description.brazilian: Danifique a ponte da fenda para atrasar os soldados.

description.english: Defeat at least 20 soldiers in Motazaar for Ashkar.
description.german: Mindestens 20 Soldaten für Ashkar in Motazaar besiegen.
description.french: Tenez en échec au moins 20 soldats à Motazaar pour Ashkar.
description.italian: Sconfiggi almeno 20 soldati a Motazaar per Ashkar.
description.spanish: Derrota al menos a 20 soldados en Motazaar para Ashkar.
description.dutch: Versla tenminste 20 soldaten in Motazaar voor Ashkar.
description.brazilian: Derrote pelo menos 20 soldados em Motazaar para Ashkar.

description.english: Set Shamaz Keb free.
description.french: Libérez le shamaz Keb.
description.italian: Libera Shamaz Keb.
description.spanish: Libera a Shamaz Keb.
description.dutch: Bevrijd Shamaz Keb.
description.brazilian: Liberte Shamaz Keb.

description.english: Reach the region of Okaar.
description.french: Atteignez la région d'Okaar.
description.italian: Raggiungi la regione di Okaar.
description.spanish: Alcanza la región de Okaar.
description.dutch: Bereik de Okaar-regio.
description.brazilian: Chegue à região de Okaar.

description.english: Kill all the gamors in the Okaar arena.
description.german: Alle Gamor in der Okaar-Arena besiegen.
description.french: Éliminez tous les gamors dans l'arène d'Okaar.
description.italian: Uccidi tutti i Gamor nell'arena di Okaar.
description.spanish: Mata a todos los Gamores en la arena de Okaar.
description.dutch: Dood alle gamors in de Okaar-arena.
description.brazilian: Mate todos os gamors na arena de Okaar.

description.english: Complete the organ puzzle in Okaar.
description.french: Trouvez la solution du casse-tête de l'orgue à Okaar.
description.italian: Completa il rompicapo dell'organo a Okaar.
description.spanish: Completa el puzle del órgano en Okaar.
description.dutch: Vervolledig de orgelpuzzel in Okaar.
description.brazilian: Complete o quebra-cabeças do órgão em Okaar.

description.english: Find the Achondar.
description.french: Trouvez l'achondar.
description.italian: Trova l'Achondar.
description.spanish: Encuentra el Achondar.
description.dutch: Vind de Achondar.
description.brazilian: Encontre o Achondar.

description.english: Obtain the Mon in Okaar.
description.french: Obtenez le Môn à Okaar.
description.italian: Ricevi il Mon a Okaar.
description.spanish: Consigue el Mon de Okaar.
description.dutch: Vind de Mon in Okaar.
description.brazilian: Obtenha o Mon em Okaar.

description.english: Reach the region of Talanzaar.
description.french: Atteignez la région de Talanzaar.
description.italian: Raggiungi la regione di Talanzaar.
description.spanish: Alcanza la región de Talanzaar.
description.dutch: Bereik de Talanzaar-regio.
description.brazilian: Chegue à região de Talanzaar.

description.english: Help Heza repair his well.
description.german: Heza dabei helfen, seinen Brunnen zu reparieren.
description.french: Aidez Heza à réparer son puits.
description.italian: Aiuta Heza a riparare il pozzo.
description.spanish: Ayuda a Heza a reparar su pozo.
description.dutch: Help Heza zijn waterput te repareren.
description.brazilian: Ajude Heza a consertar o poço.

displayName.french: Mettre en déroute des soldats pour Zot

description.english: Defeat more soldiers to convince Zot to stop paying taxes.
description.german: Mehr Soldaten besiegen, um Zot davon zu überzeugen, keine Steuern mehr zu zahlen.
description.french: Tenez en échec plus de soldats pour convaincre Zot de ne plus payer d'impôts.
description.italian: Sconfiggi più soldati per convincere Zot a non pagare più le tasse.
description.spanish: Derrota a más soldados para convencer a Zot de que deje de pagar impuestos.
description.dutch: Overtuig Zot om te stoppen met belastingen te betalen door meer soldaten te verslaan.
description.brazilian: Derrote mais soldados para convencer Zot a parar de pagar impostos.

description.english: Talk to 25 important Talans.
description.french: Parlez à 25 Talans importants.
description.italian: Parla con 25 talan importanti.
description.spanish: Habla con 25 Talanes importantes.
description.dutch: Praat met 25 belangrijke Talanen.
description.brazilian: Fale com 25 Talans importantes.

description.english: Achieve the highest level of reputation by helping the Talans.
description.german: Durch Hilfe für die Talaner das höchstes Reputationslevel erreichen.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau de réputation le plus élevé en aidant les Talans.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello più alto di reputazione aiutando i talan.
description.spanish: Alcanza el máximo nivel de reputación ayudando a los Talanes.
description.dutch: Bereik het hoogste reputatieniveau door de Talanen te helpen.
description.brazilian: Ajude os Talans e conquiste o nível de reputação mais elevado.

displayName.italian: Uso al massimo la mia UZA-SH1

description.english: Fill your backpack with over 250 rounds for your UZA-SH1.
description.german: Den Rucksack mit über 250 Schuss für deine UZA-SH1 füllen.
description.french: Remplissez votre sac avec plus de 250 munitions pour votre UZA-SH1.
description.italian: Riempi lo zaino con più di 250 proiettili per la tua UZA-SH1.
description.spanish: Llena tu mochila con más de 250 balas para tu UZA-SH1.
description.dutch: Vul je rugzak met meer dan 250 rondes voor je UZA-SH1.
description.brazilian: Encha a mochila com mais de 250 balas para sua UZA-SH1.

displayName.german: Das werden sich die Yods merken
displayName.dutch: De Yods zullen het zich berouwen

description.english: Defeat 150 soldiers.
description.french: Tenez en échec 150 soldats.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 150 soldati.
description.spanish: Derrota a 150 soldados.
description.dutch: Versla 150 soldaten.
description.brazilian: Derrote 150 soldados.

displayName.french: Puissent les Yods garder le silence !
displayName.italian: Che gli Yod rimangano in silenzio!
displayName.brazilian: Que os Yods fiquem em silêncio!

description.english: Defeat 250 soldiers.
description.french: Tenez en échec 250 soldats.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 250 soldati.
description.spanish: Derrota a 250 soldados.
description.dutch: Versla 250 soldaten.
description.brazilian: Derrote 250 soldados.

description.english: Defeat 10 soldiers using dynamite.
description.french: Tenez en échec 10 soldats à l'aide de dynamite.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 10 soldati usando la dinamite.
description.spanish: Derrota a 10 soldados usando dinamita.
description.dutch: Versla 10 soldaten door dynamiet te gebruiken.
description.brazilian: Derrote 10 soldados com dinamite.

description.english: Travel 10 times through Daokas.
description.french: Utilisez 10 fois des daokas pour voyager.
description.italian: Viaggia per 10 volte attraverso i Daoka.
description.spanish: Viaja 10 veces usando Daokas.
description.dutch: Reis 10 keer door Daokas.
description.brazilian: Viaje 10 vezes através de Daokas.

description.english: Kill 25 Krakits.
description.french: Éliminez 25 krakits.
description.italian: Uccidi 25 Krakit.
description.spanish: Mata 25 Krakits.
description.dutch: Dood 25 Krakits.
description.brazilian: Mate 25 krakits.

displayName.german: Kann's kaum erwarten, die zu nutzen
displayName.dutch: Ik kan niet wachten dit te gebruiken

description.english: Obtain over 300 rounds for your HK-P12.
description.german: Mehr als 300 Patronen für deine HK-P12 erlangen.
description.french: Obtenez plus de 300 munitions pour votre HK-P12.
description.italian: Ricevi più di 300 proiettili per la tua HK-P12.
description.spanish: Consigue más de 300 balas para tu HK-P12.
description.dutch: Bekom meer dan 300 rondes voor je HK-P12.
description.brazilian: Obtenha mais de 300 balas para sua HK-P12.

description.english: Finish main mission
description.french: Finir mission principale
description.italian: Termina la missione principale
description.spanish: Terminar la misión principal
description.dutch: Hoofdmissie voltooien
description.brazilian: Conclua a missão principal

description.english: Finish all sub-missions
description.french: Finir missions annexes
description.italian: Termina le missioni secondarie
description.spanish: Terminar todas las submisiones
description.dutch: Alle nevenmissies voltooien
description.brazilian: Conclua todas as missões secundárias
